info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 26 at 1:09AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Areas of Dense Fog Developing Once Again Across Eastern Virginia Early This Morning... Areas of dense fog were developing once again this morning generally along and east of U.S. 29 or generally along and east of a line from Lynchburg to South Boston. Visibilities in these areas have dropped to less than one mile and some locations have seen visibilities already drop to 1/4 mile or less. Fog will continue across these areas overnight and early Wednesday morning and will likely expand westward toward Danville, Bedford, and Amherst as the night progresses. If conditions continue to worsen and become more widespread, a Dense Fog Advisory may need to be issued later this morning. If you are planning travel early this morning, reduce speed, use low beam headlights, leave extra distance between you and the vehicle in front of you, and allow extra time to reach your destination.
